html.DT_OD_NS_GLOBAL_READY: This device has limited roaming capability. We recommend purchasing a global ready device if you plan to travel internationally.
html.DT_OD_NS_NO_LIMIT: All of your compatible devices have reached their sharing limit. To share this device with one of your lines at a later times, visit My Verizon
html.DT_OD_NS_OWN_NO_CONFIRMED: This device will have its own number. To share it on another line, at a later time, visit My Verizon

label.DT_OD_NS_COMPATIBLE: This device can share a number with another compatible device on your account.
label.DT_OD_NS_SHARE_EXISTING: I want this device to share one of my numbers.
label.DT_OD_NS_OWN_NUMBER: I want this device to have its own number
label.DT_OD_NS_OWN_NO_TITLE: Give this device its own number
label.DT_OD_NS_OWN_NO_DESC: This device can use its own phone number or continue to use an existing number if you're upgrading.
label.DT_OD_ENE_PAGE_SUB_TITLE: This allows response teams to quickly and accurately locate you in the event of an emergency.
